content:
I’m a resident at VinAI Research under supervision of Dr. Binh-Son Hua. Before that, I pursued my Bachelor degree at Ho Chi Minh City University of Vietnam under supervision of Prof. Nam Thoai.
My research interests include 3D Scene Understanding, Visual Reasoning.
  Download my resum√©.

title: Duong H. Le

summary: We study the effective of different retraining mechanisms while doing pruning.
title: Network Pruning that Matters: A Case Study on Retraining Variants

summary: We propose KESI - a method that combine knowledge distillation, network pruning and ensemble learning to improve the performance of compact networks.
title: Paying more attention to snapshots of Iterative Pruning: Improving Model Compression via Ensemble Distillation
